org.apache.axis2.transport.mail

Class MailOutTransportInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.axis2.transport.mail.MailOutTransportInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutTransportInfo

    public class MailOutTransportInfo
extends Object
implements OutTransportInfo
    The Mail OutTransportInfo is a holder of information to send an outgoing message (e.g. a Response or a request) to a Mail destination. Thus at a minimum a destination email address is held
